appSecret: [App Dashboard > Dashboard > click the Show button in the App Secret field]
pageAccessToken: [App Dashboard > Messenger > Settings > Token Generation > select your page > copy the token that appears]
validationToken: [App Dashboard > Webhooks > Edit Subscription > copy whatever random value you decide to use in the Verify Token field]
serverURL: [get the subdomain from your ngrok console (leave out 'https://')].ngrok.io
